messages.subject: Re: Pat & choices
messages.msgSnippet: Infinite possibilities: you could move to another house, you could have your husband work elsewhere, you could remodel the space to have a mini-kitchen or
messages.messageBody:
Infinite possibilities: you could move to another house, you could
have your husband work elsewhere, you could remodel the space to have
a mini-kitchen or refrigerator more convient, you could have an
elevator installed. Yes, you might need to choose to go back to work
or might choose not to use all your retirement money, etc. But we
always have choices.

*********************************************************************************************************************************
That's funny. I really do agree with you. I believe in liberty for all and I do make an extended effort to live that way.
Kay

[Non-text portions of this message have been removed]
